Thanks for the offer to help me.=C2=A0 But as you said, you are going throu=
gh very hard times in your life right now, and so as not to add any more st=
ress to your situation, we'll have to put that offer off for the indefinite=
 future.

--- On Tue, 8/24/10, Rick Wegrzyn <rickwegrzyn@...> wrote:
=

From: Rick Wegrzyn <rickwegrzyn@...>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A sugges=
tion for less hostility
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, August 2=
4, 2010, 7:42 AM







=C2=A0



  


    
      
      
      Rj are you =
a Paronoid person,lol...There all out to get me..You dont answer my request=
 to help you,why???





From: Rj <rasterer@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogro=
ups.com
Sent: Tue, August 24, 2010 8:27:33 AM
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] A sugg=
estion for less hostility

=C2=A0 





BTW, if anyone is wondering what I =
am talking about, this was a good example.
I offer a suggestion on getting =
things back on track with less hostility, and I am immediately attacked for=
 making the suggestion.


--- On Tue, 8/24/10, Fransen, Debbie <debbie.fran=
sen@...> wrote:


From: Fransen, Debbie <debbie.fransen@...>
Su=
bject: RE: [EVP-ITC] A suggestion for less hostility
To: "'EVP-ITC@yahoogro=
ups.com'" <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
Date: Tuesday, August 24, 2010, 7:16 AM=



=C2=A0 


that would be fine, if you didn't piss Frank off....... But yo=
u do.....
AND THAT IS NOT OKAY.....
The same thing will happen when you do =
it again....
So what's the point in you being here.



From: EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of rasterer
Sent: Tues=
day, August 24, 2010 10:08 AM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC=
] A suggestion for less hostility


=C2=A0 


I expect none of us like all =
the recent attacks, insults, accusations, threats, hurting of feelings, and=
 attempts to piss people off. 

Can I suggest we stick to the purpose of th=
e group: "the discussion, promotion, and developemnt of Electronic Voice Ph=
enomenon, and Instrumental Transcommunication methods and technologies as u=
sed in the communication with spirit, and other entities."

And that we go =
with Frank's philosophy "just take the approach, try different methods, see=
 what works."

No more threats. No name calling, insults, or accusations. J=
ust try to keep a positive group attitude, be open that not everyone believ=
es what everyone else does, and that's ok?







      

    
     

    
=
